title: Feature Request: disable save config to sql server
author: ysqi
body_snippet:
<!--
Only file GitHub issues for bugs and feature requests.  All other topics will be closed.

Before opening an issue, please search for a duplicate or closed issue.
Please provide as much detail as possible for us to fix your issue.
-->

<!-- Feature Request -->
Hello - mRemoteNG is my favorite Remote Desktop client! Thanks you!

Would it be possible to request add control for SQL Server. i don't want other can update connect info . other people just can load and  refresh connect fro...

comments.author: kmscode
comments.snippet:
The SQL code is in dire need of updates/maintenance/rewrites. Reference #182 

There's no ETA at this time when that work will begin.

Have you attempted to share a read-only user? Did this work at all? Or did it generate errors?

comments.author: ysqi
comments.snippet: will get error when exec save command by read-only user, but can continue use.
